translations: 覆在……上面（overlie 的过去式）；覆盖，铺；（尤指以感情或品质）撒满；（声音）盖过
套图透明膜；覆盖图；覆盖物，涂层；覆盖；附加的特性

sentences.sentence: An overlay showing population can be placed on top of the map.
sentences.translation: 可以在地图上加一层显示人口的透明膜。

sentences.sentence: During commercials, an overlay will appear at the bottom of the screen, prompting viewers to press a button to request a free sample or order a catalogue.
sentences.translation: 在商业广告播放时，一个弹窗将会出现在屏幕下方，促使观众按动按钮，以索要免费样品或订阅产品目录。

sentences.sentence: During commercials, an overlay will appear at the bottom of the screen, prompting viewers to press a button to request a free sample or order a coupon or a catalogue.
sentences.translation: 在广告期间，屏幕底部会出现一条信息，提示观众按下按钮以请求获得免费样品或订购优惠券或目录。
